messages.content: Paul Reynolds will be the best MP for West Ham constituency.
"Residents should get a much more active service from their MP in future"

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work with the NHS and Newham Hospital to improve service and reduce waiting lists.

issues.economy: Paul's work as an economist and understanding of countries many people in the area come from will help address low pay and high rents.
issues.governance: Fight against corruption and dodgy government deals.
issues.health: The hospital's patient-systems and staffing management need improvement; fewer service problems; shorter waiting lists.

housing.content: Struggling with high rents in the area.

leaflet.personalStatement: There are many people in the area struggling with low pay and high rents. My job as MP will be to ensure extra help to those looking for higher incomes, and those in need of understanding and support.

politicalExperience.achievements: Expertise in the reform of government and the economy.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet details Paul Reynolds' policies on economy, health and governance with a personal commitment to address low pay and high rents. Includes previous accomplishments and contact/social media information.
